articles.description: "I feel so assured of myself right now knowing someone like Belinda Clark has my back"
articles.content: Shikha Pandey on one of the learnings from Clark: "She kind of made me realise that I had so much more to offer to the game and giving up was not an option."  •  Associated Press

articles.author: Andrew McGlashan
articles.title: ACA chief executive on run-outs backing up: 'It shouldn't be the word Mankad' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "I'd be saying to all players, former players and coaches, if you stay behind the line you don't have this conversation."
articles.content: News"I'd be saying to all players, former players and coaches, if you stay behind the line you don't have this conversation."
